name: Off-Road Oil Transporter Truck
description:
Try to become an Oil Truck Transporter !
This game is all about balance of speed and heavy loads. Steer heavy oil transportation trucks and supply gasoline on distant fuel stations timely. Take control of this beautiful monster of a truck--it’s a race against time, fuel consumption of your truck and the need for speed! Drive carefully to avoid collisions and over speeding, but always deliver your fuel in time. So accept the challenge of grand truck driving and become an expert driver of this heavy fuel transporter truck.

Offroad Oil Transporter Truck Driving Simulator is a driving simulation game for everyone & drives your grand truck oil tanker from oil refinery to fill up the fuel, Oil, diesel and transport oil to the off-road petrol & diesel gas stations.
There’s no limit to the amount of speed racing and fun you can achieve; get behind the wheel of powerful truck, heavy tanker with that super charged engine, and drive through them in big city and an off road track! Take your big truck trailer transporter and deliver the gasoline oil and gas on time to the oil refinery and carefully, transport goods!
Your Fuel gradually decreases when you press the race pedal, So Become an accurate oil Transporter, Cargo Truck driver.
Become a heavy truck driver transporter, test your skills at driving and avoid the traffic in this massive world. Complete your tasks! Put your truck parking Skills to the test , Be a traffic racer, you can perform stunts with the off-road truck but obviously that not the way truckers roll , slip and slide on road and dirt with real realistic physics. Dangerous off-road terrain to test your resolve! different kinds of truck with different stats made to suit your needs, drive vehicles like the crude oil tanker transporter, cargo truck transporter.


Offroad Oil Transporter Truck Driving Simulator Features:
•Operate Giant Oil Tanker Truck and Test your Driving Skills
•Smooth and Easy Controls: Steering and Buttons
•15 Exciting Levels.
•Drive across Off road Roads and Highways
•Awesome Visuals And Sounds Effects
•3D Graphics Of Realistic Refinery Environments
•Challenging Oil Transportation Missions
•Improved AI traffic system
